Name: Portrait of Alexander the Great
Description: The remains of the head of a portrait-statue in white marble of Alexander the Great in Greek style. The nose and the chin are chipped.The features here are depicted in Lysippan style, mixed with the softness of Praxiteles. The snaky hair points to the heroic side of the Alexander's personality. The head turn slightly to the left, with an upward eye look. The lips are fleshy.
